details: Come by our cozy Italian eatery, where we serve-up a delicious menu which includes small plates, happy hour bites and vegetarian options.
Col'Cacchio serves delicious wood-fired pizzas, sumptuous pastas and gourmet salads that send taste buds into a wild frenzy.
We strive to perfect the overall eating experience with a masterful display of traditional culinary simplicity and complexity in perfect harmony within our vibrant South African URBAN landscape.
Il Leone offers a sophisticated atmosphere, with the same delicious standard of food that Mastrantonio patrons have come to love and know.
